You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

RAISE <object_id>
  - Moves something to a higher position.
  - Example: RAISE device_1

STACK <object_id>
  - Places objects neatly on top of one another.
  - Example: STACK device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNLOAD <object_id>
  - Removes a load or cargo from a vehicle or device.
  - Example: UNLOAD device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

RAISE <object_id>
  - Moves something to a higher position.
  - Example: RAISE device_1

STACK <object_id>
  - Places objects neatly on top of one another.
  - Example: STACK device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNLOAD <object_id>
  - Removes a load or cargo from a vehicle or device.
  - Example: UNLOAD device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

qa_interactions.system:
You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

RAISE <object_id>
  - Moves something to a higher position.
  - Example: RAISE device_1

STACK <object_id>
  - Places objects neatly on top of one another.
  - Example: STACK device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNLOAD <object_id>
  - Removes a load or cargo from a vehicle or device.
  - Example: UNLOAD device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

RAISE <object_id>
  - Moves something to a higher position.
  - Example: RAISE device_1

STACK <object_id>
  - Places objects neatly on top of one another.
  - Example: STACK device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNLOAD <object_id>
  - Removes a load or cargo from a vehicle or device.
  - Example: UNLOAD device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

RAISE <object_id>
  - Moves something to a higher position.
  - Example: RAISE device_1

STACK <object_id>
  - Places objects neatly on top of one another.
  - Example: STACK device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNLOAD <object_id>
  - Removes a load or cargo from a vehicle or device.
  - Example: UNLOAD device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

RAISE <object_id>
  - Moves something to a higher position.
  - Example: RAISE device_1

STACK <object_id>
  - Places objects neatly on top of one another.
  - Example: STACK device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNLOAD <object_id>
  - Removes a load or cargo from a vehicle or device.
  - Example: UNLOAD device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

RAISE <object_id>
  - Moves something to a higher position.
  - Example: RAISE device_1

STACK <object_id>
  - Places objects neatly on top of one another.
  - Example: STACK device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNLOAD <object_id>
  - Removes a load or cargo from a vehicle or device.
  - Example: UNLOAD device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

qa_interactions.system:
You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

RAISE <object_id>
  - Moves something to a higher position.
  - Example: RAISE device_1

STACK <object_id>
  - Places objects neatly on top of one another.
  - Example: STACK device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNLOAD <object_id>
  - Removes a load or cargo from a vehicle or device.
  - Example: UNLOAD device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

== Agent-Specific Actions (Tools Required) ==
INJECT <object_id>
  - Introduces a liquid into something with a syringe.
  - Example: INJECT device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

RAISE <object_id>
  - Moves something to a higher position.
  - Example: RAISE device_1

STACK <object_id>
  - Places objects neatly on top of one another.
  - Example: STACK device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNLOAD <object_id>
  - Removes a load or cargo from a vehicle or device.
  - Example: UNLOAD device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

== Agent-Specific Actions (Tools Required) ==
INJECT <object_id>
  - Introduces a liquid into something with a syringe.
  - Example: INJECT device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

RAISE <object_id>
  - Moves something to a higher position.
  - Example: RAISE device_1

STACK <object_id>
  - Places objects neatly on top of one another.
  - Example: STACK device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNLOAD <object_id>
  - Removes a load or cargo from a vehicle or device.
  - Example: UNLOAD device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

== Agent-Specific Actions (Tools Required) ==
INJECT <object_id>
  - Introduces a liquid into something with a syringe.
  - Example: INJECT device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

RAISE <object_id>
  - Moves something to a higher position.
  - Example: RAISE device_1

STACK <object_id>
  - Places objects neatly on top of one another.
  - Example: STACK device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNLOAD <object_id>
  - Removes a load or cargo from a vehicle or device.
  - Example: UNLOAD device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

== Agent-Specific Actions (Tools Required) ==
INJECT <object_id>
  - Introduces a liquid into something with a syringe.
  - Example: INJECT device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

RAISE <object_id>
  - Moves something to a higher position.
  - Example: RAISE device_1

STACK <object_id>
  - Places objects neatly on top of one another.
  - Example: STACK device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNLOAD <object_id>
  - Removes a load or cargo from a vehicle or device.
  - Example: UNLOAD device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

== Agent-Specific Actions (Tools Required) ==
INJECT <object_id>
  - Introduces a liquid into something with a syringe.
  - Example: INJECT device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===
